        Parameters:
        maker - is the company maker name.
        model - is the Stove model.
        price - is the value of Stove price in US dollar.
        warranty - is the value of the warranty.
        burners - is the value of the number of the stove burners.
        fuel - is the type of stove fuel.
        heat - is the maximum stove heat.
